INVALID_EMAIL: The format of {property} is not a valid email
INVALID_URL: The {property} is not a valid url
MIN_LENGTH: {property} must be at least {constraints.0} characters long
MAX_LENGTH: {property} must be at most {constraints.0} characters long.
REQUIRED: {property} is a required field and cannot be empty
NOT_IN_LIST: {property} must be one of the following values: {constraints}
